page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: There were 24 children in our class involved in the Doomsday project.Their names were William Pritchard,Carl Green,Dustyn Parry,Neil Parry,Ritson Lloyd,Michael Renshaw,Bryan Campden, Philip Thomas,Gareth Beeby,Gary Hurst, John Williams,Owen Bentham,Andrew Dawson,Carla Jones,Dawn Roberts,Bethan Morris,Kerry-Ann Davies,Louise Jones, Tammy Revill,Nicola Williams,Lee-Ann Thomas,Sarah Johnson,Jacqueline Pritchard,Theresa Thomas.11 of us are aged between 7-8and a half,8 of us are between 9-9 and a half,5 of us are between 10 and 10 and a half.We all live in Bagillt apart from 2 of us. Louise lives in Holywell.Ritson lives in Greenfield.They come to school by car as it is quite far to walk.Our teacher lives in Mold.He comes to school by car.
